mapper.select: select OPER, NAME, MOBILE, CLASS, PASSWORD, LOGINFLAG, LOGINIP, LOGINTIME, TEAM, GROUPID, AREA, MANAGERAREA, BIRTHDAY, IDENTIFYNUM, SEX, ACTIVEFLAG, LOCKED, TELEPHONE, DEPART, POSITION, SPCODE, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, OPERID, MENUID, STORAGE from DB_SYSADMIN where OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
